Package noppes.npcs.api.event

Class HandlerEvent.FactionsLoadedEvent

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
noppes.npcs.api.event.CustomNPCsEvent
noppes.npcs.api.event.HandlerEvent.FactionsLoadedEvent
Enclosing class:
HandlerEvent
public static class HandlerEvent.FactionsLoadedEvent extends CustomNPCsEvent

Triggered when the factions are loaded.

This event is not cancelable.

Prior to 1.11.2(29oct17), this class directly inherits from the Forge Event class.

Since:
1.8.9(29oct16)
